name: WayznAutomaticSlidingDoor
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wayzn provides freedom for you and your pet by turning your sliding glass door into a smart, automatic pet door.

Wayzn allows for secure access to the yard, anytime. No matter where you are. When you're home Wayzn acts like a smart doggy door opening and closing automatically when it detects your pet. When you're away Wayzn can notify you to check the surroundings with your security camera before opening and closing your door. Wayzn Automatic Sliding Door will link to the Amazon account with your associated Alexa. Linking is established from the Wayzn official mobile application.

Wayzn Automatic Sliding Door skill offers Wayzn owners another convenient way to open your door with Alexa.

To use the Wayzn Automatic Sliding Door skill you require to own a Wayzn device.

You can purchase your Wayzn from https://wayzn.com/
